trans-unit.source: Binds a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> to the event handlers that implement the command.
trans-unit.target: 将绑定<xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref>到实现该命令的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: A CommandBinding associates a command with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> events which implement and determine the status of the command.
trans-unit.target: CommandBinding 将具有的命令相关联<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>事件实现并确定命令的状态。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method of a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> events are raised on the command target.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>调用时， <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>对命令目标引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the command target has a CommandBinding for the command, the appropriate handlers are called.
trans-unit.target: 如果对命令目标有命令 CommandBinding，将调用相应的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a CommandBinding for the command, the events are routed through the element tree until an element that has a CommandBinding is found.
trans-unit.target: 如果对命令目标没有命令 CommandBinding，直到找到具有 CommandBinding 的元素，通过元素树进行路由事件。

trans-unit.source: A CommandBinding has limited use with an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> that is not a<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: CommandBinding 具有有限的使用情况<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>，它是不一<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>。</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: This is because a CommandBinding binds the command to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> which listen to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> routed events which are raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> are called.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为 CommandBinding 绑定到命令<xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler>其侦听<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute>路由事件时引发<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>称为。</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> class by using the specified <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref>通过使用指定的<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>类

trans-unit.source: The command to base the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> on.
trans-unit.target: 要基于新的命令<xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref>上。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> class by using the specified <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> and the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref>使用指定的类<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>和指定<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref>事件处理程序。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: The command to base the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> on.
trans-unit.target: 要基于新的命令<xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref>上。

trans-unit.source: The handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref> event on the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref>对新的事件<xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> class by using the specified <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> and the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute"></xref> event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref>使用指定的类<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>和指定<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute"></xref>事件处理程序。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: The command to base the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> on.
trans-unit.target: 要基于新的命令<xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref>上。

trans-unit.source: The handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref> event on the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref>对新的事件<xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute"></xref> event on the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute"></xref>对新的事件<xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the command associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> initiates a check to determine whether the command can be executed on the command target.
trans-unit.target: 与此关联的命令时发生<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref>启动检查以确定是否可以对命令目标执行该命令。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute> event is raised on the command target.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>调用时，<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>对命令目标引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the event is not handled, the CanExecute event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果不处理该事件，将引发 CanExecute 事件。

trans-unit.source: If the command target has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command, the CanExecute handler for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果对命令目标有<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>命令 CanExecute 处理程序，<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>称为。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command, the CanExecute event bubbles up the element tree searching for an element that has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令目标没有<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>对于命令，CanExecute 事件树中向上冒泡元素具有的元素，搜索<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>与命令关联。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate|| - The corresponding tunneling event is .
trans-unit.target: # # 路由事件信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |路由策略 |冒泡 | |委托 || -相应的隧道事件是.

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>与此关联<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: The command associated with this binding.
trans-unit.target: 与此绑定关联的命令。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the command associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: 与此关联的命令时发生<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref>执行。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> executes, it raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted> event on the command target.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>执行，它会发出<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>命令目标上的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted> event is not handled, the Executed event is raised on the command target.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>不处理事件，执行事件引发对命令目标。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>

trans-unit.source: If the command target has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the specific command, the Executed handler for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果对命令目标有<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>对于特定的命令中，执行处理程序，<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>称为。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for that specific command the Executed event bubbles up the element tree searching for an element that has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令目标没有<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>特定命令执行事件向上元素树搜索具有的元素，该冒泡<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>与命令关联。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is not found, the command is not handled.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>未找到，则该命令未处理。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate|| - The corresponding tunneling event is .
trans-unit.target: # # 路由事件信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |路由策略 |冒泡 | |委托 || -相应的隧道事件是.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the command associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> initiates a check to determine whether the command can be executed on the current command target.
trans-unit.target: 与此关联的命令时发生<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref>启动检查以确定是否可以对当前的命令目标执行该命令。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is called, the PreviewCanExecute event is raised on the command target if the command target has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>调用时，将引发事件对命令目标命令目标是否 PreviewCanExecute<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>命令。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> handler for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: 则<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>称为。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> event bubbles up the element tree searching for an element that has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令目标没有<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>对于命令，<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>事件气泡搜索具有的元素，在元素树中向上<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>与命令关联。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the event is not handled, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果不处理该事件，<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Tunneling| |Delegate|| - The corresponding bubbling event is .
trans-unit.target: # # 路由事件信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |路由策略 |隧道 | |委托 || -相应冒泡事件是.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the command associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: 与此关联的命令时发生<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref>执行。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> executes, it raises the PreviewExecuted event on the command target.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>执行，它会发出对命令目标上的 PreviewExecuted 事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: If the command target has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command the PreviewExecuted handler for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果对命令目标有<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>PreviewExecuted 命令处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>称为。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command the PreviewExecuted event tunnels down the element tree searching for an element that has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令目标没有<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>命令 PreviewExecuted 事件隧道向下搜索具有的元素，在元素树<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>与命令关联。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the preview event is not handled, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> event is raised on command target.
trans-unit.target: 如果不处理预览事件，<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>命令目标引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>
